import styles from './myPage.module.scss' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { PersonIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { userInfoState } from 'states/userInfo' import { useRecoilValue } from 'recoil' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import store from 'store' import Toggle from './Toggle' import { cartStoreState, likeStoreState } from 'states/storeState' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' const User = () => { const userInfo = useRecoilValue(userInfoState) const [cartStoreData, setCartStoreData] = useRecoil(cartStoreState) const [likeStoreData, setLikeStoreData] = useRecoil(likeStoreState) const storeList = { like: likeStoreData, cart: cartStoreState, search: searchStore, } const clickDeleteBtn = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset store.set( value, cartStoreData.filter((data: SearchStructure) => data.isbn !== value) ) } return (
{userInfo.userName} ({userInfo.userId})

) } export default User
